meanings.sent1: She is reshaping the clay into a new sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The artist is reshaping the painting to improve it.
meanings.sent3: The potter reshaping the clay accidentally made a funny-looking vase.
meanings.sent4: Her experiences are reshaping her perspective on life.
meanings.sent5: The storm is reshaping the coastline, eroding the cliffs.

meanings.definition: The act of shaping again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The reshaping of the landscape took years to complete.
meanings.sent2: The reshaping of the company's image was a success.
meanings.sent3: The sudden reshaping of the clouds made them look like animals.
meanings.sent4: The reshaping of history books often reflects changing perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The reshaping of the city skyline was a sight to behold.
